item.title: American George Glezmann freed by Taliban after being detained for over 2 years
item.description: George Glezmann, a U.S. citizen who was detained by the Taliban for more than two years, has been released, according to the State Department.

item.title: Trump criticizes Fed decision to maintain interest rates
item.description: Trump's comments came hours after the Fed opted to hold interest rates steady.
